roadmap.title: 12-Month Launch Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Recommended path for a founder entering the AVGC-XR space today (Teacher Training + LMS strategy).

phases.title: Research, Network & Register
phases.desc: Visit IICT Mumbai. Meet Karnataka/Maharashtra state AVGC cells. Register company under Startup India. Identify 3 pilot schools. Attend India AI Impact Summit & AVGC events to build relationships.

phases.title: Build MVP & Run Pilot Training
phases.desc: Design a 5-day teacher bootcamp curriculum. Partner with 2-3 AVGC experts. Run free pilot in 2 schools. Collect data, testimonials, impact metrics. Build basic LMS with course content.
